tool_description: A list of beers from many European countries
name: Beers List
title: Beers List

api_list.name: Get beers by single country
api_list.description:
Available Countries are:
- denmark
- sweden
- belgium
- spain
- portugal
- ireland
- luxembourg
- norway
- finland
- switzerland
- czech
- italy
- poland
- malta
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://beers-list.p.rapidapi.com/beers/italy"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "beers-list.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://beers-list.p.rapidapi.com/beers/{beerid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "beers-list.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
